Address.Address1: Jl. Pantai Gumicik, Br. Gumicik, Ketewel

Description.Text:
Property Location
When you stay at Pandawa Beach Villas & Spa in Denpasar, you'll be on the beach and close to Matahari Terbit Beach and Sanur Beach. This 4-star villa is within close proximity of Kesiman Palace and Le Mayeur Museum.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 14 air-conditioned rooms featuring private pools and LCD televisions. Your memory foam bed comes with down comforters. Prepare your meals in the shared/communal kitchen. Cable programming and MP3 docking stations are provided for your entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Private bathrooms have deep soaking bathtubs and complimentary toiletries.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages. This Art Deco villa also features complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and tour/ticket assistance. Guests can catch a ride to nearby destinations on the complimentary area shuttle.

Dining
Take advantage of the villa's room service (during limited hours).

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a computer station, express check-in, and express check-out. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request).


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Take advantage of the villa's room service (during limited hours).
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

When you stay at Pandawa Beach Villas & Spa in Denpasar, you'll be on the beach and close to Matahari Terbit Beach and Sanur Beach. This 4-star villa is within close proximity of Kesiman Palace and Le Mayeur Museum.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Matahari Terbit Beach - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Kesiman Palace - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Le Mayeur Museum - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Sanur Beach - 3 km / 1.9 mi
Bali Beach Golf Course - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Maha Art Gallery - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Udayana Golf Driving Range - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Museum Sidik Jari - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi
Danes Art Veranda - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi
Pura Segara Temple - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi
Honorary Consulate of Sweden and Finland - 3.6 km / 2.2 mi
Consular Agency of the United States of America - 3.6 km / 2.3 mi
Consulate General Republic Democratic Timor Leste - 3.9 km / 2.4 mi
Taman Werdhi Budaya Art Center - 4 km / 2.5 mi
Bali Art Centre - 4.1 km / 2.5 mi

The preferred airport for Pandawa Beach Villas & Spa is Denpasar (DPS-Ngurah Rai Intl.) - 15.6 km / 9.7 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
